column2: "Na Saul da ho ara retseetsee na ɔrehyɛ Ewuradze n'esuafo no amen no
column5: "na okebisaa no hɔ tum nwoma dɛ ɔdze rokɔ Damaskɔs akɔ nhyiamudan no mu
column6: ama sɛ ohu binom a wɔwɔ Ɔkwan no mu a
column9: ɔaakyekyer hɔn dze hɔn aaba Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔnam na ɔbɛɛn Damaskɔs no
column3: awerɛfir mu ara kan fii sor bɛhyerɛnee twaa no ho hyiae;"

column2: "na ɔhwee daadze
column3: na ɔtsee ndze bi a ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Saul
column6: ɔyɛ dɛn na eretseetsee me yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ewuradze? Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Emi nye Jesus a etaa no do no:"

column2: "na soɛr kɔ kurow no mu
column3: na wɔbɛka dza ɔsɛ wo dɛ eyɛ akyerɛ wo."

column2: "Na mbarimba a wɔnye no nam no totɔɔ mmum gyinagyinaa hɔ
column4: naaso woennhu obiara."

column2: "Na Saul soɛree fii famu
column4: oennhu obiara
column5: na wosusuoo ne nsa dze no baa Damaskɔs."

column2: "Na ndaansa nna onnhu adze
"Nna osuanyi bi wɔ Damaskɔs a ne dzin dze Ananias; ɔno na Ewuradze kaa kyerɛɛ no wɔ enyido adzehu mu dɛ
column4: Emi nye yi

column2: "Na Ewuradze see no dɛ
column3: Soɛr kɔ ɔbrɔn a wɔfrɛ no Tɔɔtsen no mu
column4: na kebisa wɔ Judas fie obi a ne dzin dze Saul a ofi Tarsus no n'ekyir kwan
column8: "na oehu n'enyiwa do dɛ ɔbarimba a ne dzin dze Ananias reba ne nkyɛn
column9: na ɔdze ne nsa ato no do dɛ onhu adze."

column2: "Na Ananias buaa dɛ
column4: matse ɔbarimba yi ho asɛm wɔ nyimpa pii anomu
column5: bɔn dodow a ɔdze ayɛ w'ahotseweefo no wɔ Jerusalɛm;"

column2: "na ha yi so ɔwɔ tum wɔ asɔfompanyin no nsamu dɛ ɔnkyer hɔn a wɔbɔ wo dzin nyina."
"Na Ewuradze see no dɛ
column4: na oyi nye nyia meyi no dɛ ɔnsoa me dzin nkɔ amanaman nye ahemfo

column2: "na mebɛkyerɛ no amandze pii a otwar dɛ ohu wɔ me dzin ntsi."
"Na Ananias kɔree
column4: na ɔdze ne nsa too no do see no dɛ
column6: Ewuradze Jesus a oyii noho kyerɛɛ wo wɔ ɔkwan a enam do reba no mu no
column8: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn nhyɛ wo ma."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara na biribi tse dɛ abon fii n'enyiwa do gui
column3: na ohun adze; na ɔsoɛree ma wonumaa no;"

column2: "na ɔgyee edziban dzii ma no ho yɛɛ no dzen. Na odzii esuafo a wɔwɔ Damaskɔs no nkyɛn nda kakra."
"Na ntsɛmara ɔkaa Jesus ho asɛm wɔ nhyiamudan no mu dɛ ɔno nye Nyankopɔn Ba."
"Na hɔn a wɔtsee nyina hɔn ho boow hɔn
column4: Ana nnyɛ oyi nye nyia ɔsɛɛ hɔn a wɔbɔ dzin yi wɔ Jerusalɛm no
column5: ana nyɛ iyi ntsi na ɔbaa ha dɛ ɔrebɛfa hɔn nkyehoma mu akɛma asɔfompanyin no bi?"

column2: "Na mbom Saul n'ahoɔdzen yɛɛ dzen mbordo
column3: na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ kofee dɛ Jesus nye Kraest no ara no
column4: maa Jewfo a wɔwɔ Damaskɔs ho boow hɔn."

column2: "Na nda pii durii no Jewfo no paam ne tsir do dɛ woboku no:"
"na Saul tsee hɔn apam no. Na wɔweɔɔn mbobow no ano ewia nye anadwe dɛ woboku no;"
"na n'esuafo no faa no anadwe dze no too kɛntsɛn mu duaa fasu mu gyaagyaa no too famu."
"Na odur Jerusalɛm no
column3: ɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ ɔdze noho kɔbɔ esuafo no ho; naaso hɔn nyina suroo no
column4: na wɔanngye enndzi dɛ ɔyɛ osuanyi."

column2: "Na Barnabas faa no dze no kɔr asomafo no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔkyerɛɛ mu kyerɛɛ hɔn mbrɛ ohun Ewuradze wɔ kwan no mu
column4: na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no
column5: na mbrɛ ɔnam Jesus dzin mu kaa asɛm ndam do wɔ Damaskɔs."

column2: "Na ɔnye hɔn dzii ndɔfir wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: "na ɔdze ndam kaa asɛm wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu; na ɔnye Helenifo no kasae na wɔgyee ekyingye; na wɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ woku no."

column2: "Na enuanom no tsee no
column4: na wɔsomaa no fii hɔ kɔr Tarsus."

column2: "Nna asɔrasɔr a wɔwɔ Judea nye Galilii nye Samaria nyina nyaa asomdwee
column3: na wonyaa ntowdo na wɔnam Ewuradze no suro nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no n'awerɛkyekyer do dɔree."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Peter rikyin hɔn nyina do no
column3: ɔbaa ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Lida no so nkyɛn."

column2: "Na obohun nyimpa bi a ne dzin dze Aeneas a ɔyar mbubui a ɔada ne kɛtɛ do mfe awɔtwe wɔ hɔ."
"Na Peter see no dɛ
column4: Jesus Kraest nsa wo yarba: soɛr
column5: na sɛw wo kɛtɛ. Na ɔsoɛɛr ntsɛmara."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔwɔ Lida nye Saron nyina hun no
"Nna osuanyi bi wɔ Jopa a ne dzin dze Tabita a ne nkyerɛase nye Dorkas : nna ndwuma pa nye adɔyɛ ahyɛ ɔbaa yi ma."
column3: "#9.36 Edzin Tabita wɔ Aramaik kasa na Dorkas wɔ Griik kasa mu no ne nkyerɛase nye: Ɔwansan."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu ɔyaree na owui; na wowiee no eguar no wɔdze no kɔtoo aborɔsan bi mu."
"Ɔnam dɛ Lida bɛn Jopa ntsi
column3: esuafo no tsee dɛ Peter wɔ hɔ no
column4: wɔsomaa mbarimba beenu wɔ no hɔ kɛserɛɛ no dɛ
column5: Mma nnyɛ ekyim dɛ ebɛba hɛn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Peter soɛree nye hɔn kɔree. Na odurii no
column3: wɔdze no kɔr aborɔsan no mu
column4: na ekunafo no nyina begyinaa ne nkyɛn sui na wɔdze ntar nye atam a Dorkas nye hɔn wɔ hɔ no ɔyɛe no kyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na Peter yii hɔn nyina edzi
column3: na obuu ntwɛr bɔɔ mpaa; na ɔdaan noho baa fun no do see dɛ
column4: Tabita

column2: "Na Peter tseen ne nsa maa no ma osuoo mu soɛree
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ ahotseweefo no nye ekunafo no dze no enyikan kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔtsee no wɔ Jopa nyina
"Na afei ɔtsenaa Jopa nda pii wɔ Simon nwomahyɛfo bi nkyɛn."
